sourcesContent: import { Component, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import {TetrisCoreComponent} from 'ngx-tetris'; @Component({ selector: 'app-error', templateUrl: './error.component.html', styleUrls: ['./error.component.css'] }) export class ErrorComponent { @ViewChild('game') private _tetris: TetrisCoreComponent = undefined as any; public bw = false; public moveLeft = false; public moveDown = false; public moveRight = false; public rotate = false; public start = false; public stop = false; public reset = false; public onLineCleared() { console.log('line cleared'); } public onGameOver() { alert('game over'); } public onRotateButtonPressed() { this._tetris.actionRotate(); } }
